rocks.bastion.core

Class TemplateContentCompiler

  • java.lang.Object
    • rocks.bastion.core.TemplateContentCompiler

  • public class TemplateContentCompiler
extends Object
    An internal class which uses a templating engine (JMustache in this case) to provide templating functionality for Bastion. The user supplies a Mustache template as an input to this class' constructor. They then execute addVariableAssignment(String, Object) and addAllVariableAssignments(Map) to assign actual values to the variables declared in the template. The getContent() method then returns a fully resolved template with all variables resolved to their given values.

    See the Mustache man page for an explaination of how to write Mustache templates that can be interpreted by this class.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TemplateContentCompiler(String template)
      Construct a new template compiler object for the given Mustache template source text.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TemplateContentCompiler

        public TemplateContentCompiler(String template)
        Construct a new template compiler object for the given Mustache template source text. The variable delimeters for this template are double opening/closing braces.
        Parameters:
        template - The Mustache template source text. Cannot be null.

    • Method Detail

      • getTemplate

        public String getTemplate()
        Gets the currently set template source text. The template text is a Mustache template.
        Returns:
        The template source text.

      • getVariableAssignments

        public Map<String,?> getVariableAssignments()
        Gets the currently set variable assignment for the template. Each key in the returned map is the name of the variable to replace. The mapped value for each key is then the value which will be replaced for that particular variable in the template.
        Returns:
        A non-null assignment of variable names to values to use for the template

      • addVariableAssignment

        public void addVariableAssignment(String variable,
                                  Object assignment)
        Assign a new value to a particular variable name.
        Parameters:
        variable - A non-null variable name to assign a new value for.
        assignment - A non-null value to assign to the given variable name.

      • addAllVariableAssignments

        public void addAllVariableAssignments(Map<String,?> variableAssignments)
        Assign an entire assignment of variables to their values. Calling this method is equivalent to calling the addVariableAssignment(String, Object) method for each entry in the supplied map.
        Parameters:
        variableAssignments - An entire map of variable assignments to use when resolving the template. Cannot be null.

      • getContent

        public String getContent()
        Returns the fully resolved template. The variables in the template are resolved using the variable assignment given using the addVariableAssignment(String, Object) and addAllVariableAssignments(Map) methods.
        Returns:
        A non-null string resulting from resolving the template using the variable assignment.
